OOC: My pleasure Soulstice!  This post is not for the squeemish!  Soulstice, 
if you dont want me to tell the gore, this post is void.
:::Sharpedge:::

::He grinned evilly.  He was going to rip this guy apart!::
Sharpedge: Thank you for the honor Shockaract!
::He powers up his spinner hand, and first swipes it across Testifier's 
belly.  Guts and mech fluid start spewing.  he moves his deadly weapon that 
killed Granite up to Testifiers chest, than his face, ripping all traces of 
life away from his broken body.  He than fires 2 missles at Testifier, 
instantly reducing his body to ash::
Sharpedge: Well, comrades, was that satisfying?
